item.title: K-Electric Field Service Management
item.description: A web & mobile field service solution for K-Electric, enabling 2,000+ meter readers to manage daily assignments with AI-powered meter reading, maps, and offline sync.

item.title: ALCE – Study Italian in Bologna
item.description: Official student app for ALCE Bologna, bringing lessons, activities, accommodation, food ordering, language tests, and documents into one mobile experience.

item.title: Velora: A Voice-Controlled mHealth Application with Adaptive User Interface for Elderly Users
item.description: A Doctor Appointment App that features accessibility options like voice control, bilingual support, adjustable elements and colorblind mode, alongside core functions such as appointment booking and health reminders.

item.title: Intenly – Voice Dataset Builder
item.description: Intenly helps ML teams quickly collect multilingual speech with transcripts and intent labels, then export training-ready datasets.

item.title: Zephyr – E-Commerce App
item.description: Zephyr is a Firebase-backed e-commerce solution with a customer-facing Android app and an admin panel for managing products, orders, and analytics.

item.title: Image Manipulation App
item.description: An offline-first Android image tools app to crop, resize, compress, convert, and share images, saving results straight to the gallery.

item.title: IMDb Movies List App
item.description: An Android app that fetches movies from an IMDb API, caches them locally with Room, and lets users browse, review, and rate titles offline.

item.title: Media Player Desktop Application
item.description: A YouTube-inspired desktop media player with smart HUD behavior, keyboard shortcuts, and smooth audio/video playback, built with Java and JavaFX.

item.title: News Website
item.description: A React-based news site that fetches live articles by category, with search, detail pages, and SPA navigation.

item.title: Todo List Application
item.description: A cross-platform desktop Todo app with deadline tracking, search, local persistence, and email export, built with Java and JavaFX.

item.title: E-Commerce React-Native App
item.description: An Ecommerce App with complete admin panel and Firebase as backend

item.title: Android development Intern
item.description: R&D Branch (Military College of Signals) | Islamabad, Pakistan
